author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

The PoolDBOutputService object is the main CMSSW interface for the creation of new condition set and the update of Tags in the central database.  The actions supported ( create, append, write, erase, ... ) require to operate within a transactional workflow, generally explicit, optionally implicit. The overall model and the implementation has been revisited, simplifying and clarifying the usage of the interface on the client side.

#### PR validation:

unit tests and integration tests
title: Improvements in DBOutputService transaction workflow
